basics.name: Vijay Rajan Machingauth
basics.label: Engineering Manager Technical
basics.summary: Building & Leading high-velocity teams focused on delivering Complex Products, Experience managing cross-geo teams, Server SoC Power Management, Firmware Validation, Arch/Micro arch debug in Pre/Post Si Env, ARM and X86 architectures, CAD tools development for Microprocessors/Graphics, C, C++, Python, Perl & Ruby, Emulation bring up/debug/collateral development

work.position: Senior Engineering Manager Technical, IPG, Intel Corporation
work.summary: Lead the Server Power Management Firmware Validation and the Intel Server Manageability IP Development Teams - Reponsible for delivery of Zero-Defect Power Management FW for all Intel Server Products & Intel Server Manageability IP. Also Lead the Power-Management IP Emulation Strategy
Senior Chief Engineer and Validation Architect responsible for Validation Strategy for Exynos Mobile SoCs. Simulation, Emulation, Multi-IP Validation & Multi-Processor Validation Strategies

Lead a team focused on Xeon Power Management Post-Silicon Validation. Driving test content development, execution and debug. Responsibilities include content and execution planning, failure debug for internal and externally reported issues.
highlights: Lead Power Management Post-Si Validation of Jaketown, Ivytown and Broadwell Server

work.position: Technical Lead, Post-Silicon Debug and Debug tools
work.summary: Lead a team developing Post-Silicon Debug Tools. These tools are used for the Post-Si System Debug of Intel Multi-Core Xeon Microprocessors. Validation of Power-Management features and manual debug of failures.
Lead a team to develop Post-Si tools that increased debug productivity and improved TTM.
Validation tools - Architectural/Micro-Architectural pre-silicon validation tools, Developing simulation/emulation solutions.

education.institution: Sri Venkateswara College of Engg, Chennai

awards.title: IAA at Intel
awards.summary: Intel Achievement Award (IAA) for RTL simulator development and deployment.
